info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 26 at 2:29PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Cabarrus and north central Mecklenburg Counties through 300 PM EDT... At 228 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Huntersville, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Huntersville, Kannapolis, Downtown Concord, Northeast Charlotte, West Concord, Harrisburg, University City, Coddle Creek Reservoir, Charlotte Motor Speedway and Northwest Charlotte. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
